name: Neptune Cash
description: Neptune is a next-generation Layer 1 blockchain protocol, built from scratch to deliver privacy, scalability, and resilience against future quantum threats. Key innovations include: Privacy-first UTXO model with scalable, verifiable smart contracts (via SNARKs). Post-quantum cryptography securing the network against tomorrow’s adversaries. Proof-of-Work consensus with adaptive block sizes to maximize throughput. Native Layer 2 compatibility for seamless scaling. Fast sync & small storage footprint enabled by advanced SNARK technology. Hard-capped supply of 42M coins, ensuring scarcity and long-term soundness. Neptune combines uncompromising privacy with robust scalability, aiming to be both the world’s most advanced private smart contract platform and a contender for the future of money.
